channel.title: Louder With Crowder
channel.itunes:subtitle: Entertainment and enlightenment. In that order.
channel.itunes:author: Steven Crowder
channel.itunes:summary: Steven Crowder brings you news, entertainment and politics with the most politically incorrect show on the web. Guests, rants, sketches, your calls ... it's whatever.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Undertaker Explains 'Mysterious' Clotting Phenomenon
item.description:
Even with online speech becoming freer by the moment, doctors and other professionals still risk losing their licenses for "misinformation." But I found one mortician who isn't afraid to talk about the strange fibrous clots that are now the norm for the fully vaccinated and recently deceased. U.K.-based John O'Looney joins me to discuss the most contentious subject on social media: Why “died suddenly" is REALLY trending!
Come See Standup! - http://www.louderwithcrowder.com/tour
NEW MERCH! https://crowdershop.com/

It’s coffee, corona, and Korea in this one.

item.title: #11 The Science Against Porn, Free Speech and Kurt Schlicter
item.description: This week on Louder With Crowder, we start off dealing with the news of the week. Obama, ISIS, Rudy Giuliani and the like. But we also have a fascinating discussion with Gary Wilson, author of “Your Brain on Porn” as we discuss the physiological and cultural ramifications coming from a generation raised with online pornography. The data is staggering. You can watch our interview on the video-cast, or listen to it on the go with the full audio podcast below! We’re also joined by my friend Kurt Schlicter to discuss freedom of speech, the military and exercising as you get older!

item.title: #10 Vegan Myths Debunked, Chapel Hill Shooting & Free Speech!
item.description: We had a full week this week! Brian Williams was suspended without pay for 6 months. An Atheist progressive opened fire on 3 innocent Muslims and University of Michigan took one more step toward banning free speech. We discuss all of that in this week’s Louder With Crowder, but more importantly, I was joined by radical feminist, environmentalist Lierre Keith. Surprisingly, we agreed on a lot and she educated us on some of the most common, but patently false vegetarian myths and claims! Full video- interview and podcast below! Be sure to SUBSCRIBE ON ITUNES so that you can take the show with you on the go!

item.title: #8 Michael Loftus, Ed Morrissey and The “N word.”
item.description: This week on the podcast we were joined by the wonder Michael Loftus and Ed Morrissey. American Sniper, Michael Moore and Kevin Costner admitting to using the “N” word were all discussed. Download it, subscribe on iTunes or watch the clips below! So on CNN, Kevin Costner admitted to having used the N word. Many times. So what? Does that make him a racist? Watch for yourself and decide on whether the context matters in this instance.

item.title: #7 Dean Cain Backs Up Talk, Imam Choudary Threatens Death!
item.description: This week was a slam-bang episode of “Louder With Crowder.” Firstly, the one and only Dean Cain stops by to discuss his Michael Moore comments. Not only did he double-down, but he backed them up in style, as only superman himself could! He also gave some insight on “American Sniper” Chris Kyle. Not only that, but Imam Anjem Choudary stopped by. For REAL. Not a joke. He told us how he plans to bring Shariah to Britain, America and his support for the current regimes in Iraq and Syria. Also, veiled threats on my life. Do not miss this episode and remember, you can always SUBSCRIBE ON ITUNES to take “Louder With Crowder” on the go. It’s all free!

Andrew Klavan joined me on this week’s podcast to explain… Also in this episode, Krystal Heath chats with us about people who hate children, and Jordan Crowder’s here to talk about how oh-so-progressive Hollywood managed to give us an all-white Oscars this year. item.title: #4 The Top Historical Arguments for Christmas & Jesus!
item.description: This one’s a must-listen. Our good friend, apologetics specialist Gerald Morgan stopped by for two whole hours (starting at 16:00) to make the historical and scientific case for Christmas, why it happened and just the kind of impact that it had on the world. Did Jesus exist? Where/when was he born? Why do so many people miss it? Do not miss! This week, yes we were joined by the fantastic Michelle Malkin. But you can watch that interview on video here.

item.title: #3 Does U.S. Condone “Torture” or Are We Just Pansies?
item.description: In this week’s podcast, we discuss the CIA/torture scandal, the #WarOnWomen and the #EricGarner choke case with UFC Champ Pat Miletich. Do Americans condone torture? How is it defined? Have we generally just become a nation of unqualified pansies? Special guests: Gerald Morgan and Krystal Heath!

item.title: #2 Are Cops Racist? Do Chokeholds Kill?
item.description: SUBSCRIBE ON ITUNES This week we’re joined by the fantastic John Hawkins of RightWingNews.com, and the lovely Kate Bryan of Acculterated and LiveActionFilms. We were also joined by Rener Gracie, but the audio was corrupted, so we’ll get him back this month. We discuss the increasingly destructive Ferguson riots, racist cops, Chris Rock’s recent, racist statements and exactly what happened in the famous New York chokehold case. Also, FunDip discusses his trips to the grocery store. Hold onto your butts!

item.title: #1 My French Mom Calls on Immigration! + Guests!
item.description: SUBSCRIBE ON ITUNES FOR FREE! This week, Obama gave his speech/plans on immigration. The short end: it’s a fast-track to get illegal immigrants their green card. You know who’s not happy about that? MY MOM! French-Canadian mamma Crowder calls in to tell us what it was like to immigrate here LEGALLY. Don’t miss her hilarious, broken-english rant. Also, my dad counters with HIS experience in immigrating to French Canada. Insightful and frustrating. Also, progressive HipHughes stops by for some debate, and psychologist Julie Steiner enlightens us on mental health issues and chemical addictions.
